TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pkcs12ShroudedKeyBag extends System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12SafeBag
Public NotInheritable Class Pkcs12ShroudedKeyBag Inherits Pkcs12SafeBag

Docs.summary: Represents the ShroudedKeyBag from PKCS#12, a container whose contents are a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo. This class cannot be inherited.

MemberSignature.Value: public Pkcs12ShroudedKeyBag (ReadOnlyMemory<byte> encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey, bool skipCopy = false);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.ReadOnlyMemory`1<unsigned int8> encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey, bool skipCopy) cil managed
Public Sub New (encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte), Optional skipCopy As Boolean = false)

Docs.param: to store without making a defensive copy; otherwise, . The default is .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the from an existing encoded PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This method validates that `encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey` is a single BER-encoded value, but it does not verify that the value is a proper PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value.
The default behavior of this method is to make a defensive copy of `encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey`. When the `skipCopy` parameter is `true`, this defensive copy is skipped. If the defensive copy is skipped and the contents of `encryptedPkcs8PrivateKey` change during the lifetime of the returned value or of any object produced by its methods or properties, then methods and properties on those objects may produce nonsense results or throw exceptions due to the corrupted state. Callers are therefore advised to only use a `true` value for the `skipCopy` parameter when they can be reasonably assured that the data will stay intact.

Docs.exception: The parameter does not represent a single ASN.1 BER-encoded value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte)
public: property ReadOnlyMemory<System::Byte> EncryptedPkcs8PrivateKey { ReadOnlyMemory<System::Byte> get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a memory value containing the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value transported by this bag.
Docs.value: A memory value containing the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value transported by this bag.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
No validation is performed that the returned value is a valid PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo value.
This property is an alias for the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs12SafeBag.EncodedBagValue?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
